extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite    Level 3 or above or 6.0 units at the 100 level in RELS

basic.description: A study of the tensions that come into play as Jews formulated views of the Other to balance co-existence with them. Source materials include authoritative writings of Jewish commentary and law and social scientific views of them.
basic.subject: RELS
basic.title: Jewish Views of the Other
